methods.heading: Payment Methods
methods.content: Furniro offers multiple payment methods including Internet Banking, Credit/Debit Cards, Wallet, and Cash on Delivery (C-o-D). All transactions are secured via trusted payment gateways using encryption technology.

hiddenCharges.heading: Hidden Charges
hiddenCharges.content: There are no hidden charges. Product prices are final and inclusive of applicable taxes. Delivery charges may vary depending on the seller policy.

cashOnDelivery.heading: Cash on Delivery (C-o-D)
cashOnDelivery.content: With C-o-D, you pay in cash at the time of delivery. Maximum order value allowed is â‚¹50,000. Gift Cards, store credits, or foreign currency cannot be used.

cardPayments.heading: Credit/Debit Card Payments
cardPayments.content: Furniro accepts payments via Visa, MasterCard, Maestro, and American Express cards. International cards cannot be used for Wallet, Flyte, or eGV payments.

internetBanking.heading: Internet Banking
internetBanking.content: Payments via Internet Banking are accepted from multiple banks for direct fund transfers. Transactions are highly secure with encryption.

security.heading: Transaction Security
security.content: All online transactions are protected with 256-bit encryption. 3D Secure password and bank verification add an extra layer of security.

emi.heading: Credit Card EMI
emi.content: Furniro offers EMI options for select banks with 3, 6, 9, 12, 18, or 24-month tenures. No processing fee is charged, and interest is managed by the respective bank.
